features: MORE THAN TOAST: Make toast, bagels, pizza, paninis, even cookies! Great for smaller portions, picky eaters, or on the go Plus, its mini size makes it more energy efficient than your oven
TIMER CONTROL: Timer is dial controlled, so your food Comes out perfectly toasted every time.
EASY CLEAN: Backing tray, oven rack, and crumb tray are all removable and dishwasher safe for quick clean up and spotless countertops (all other surfaces are wipe clean)

PERFECT GIFT: The perfect wedding or new home gift Its small size takes up little counter space, and its sleek design and trendy color options will match any kitchen décor (Add to your registry now! )

INCLUDES: Backed by a 1-year manufacturer , The 550 watt DASH compact toaster oven includes baking tray, oven rack, crumb tray, recipe book and recipe database access (all non-electric parts are easily wiped clean)
body.description: The Dash Mini Toaster Oven is perfect for cooking with limited counter space. Make single slices of toast, bagels, mini-pizzas, even cookies! The cute and compact Mini Toaster Oven includes a removable baking tray, oven rack, and crumb tray for easy cleaning. Great for a dorm room or camper / RV, this Mini Toaster Oven is a convenient solution for making quick snacks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does A Good Job!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a small toaster oven that could be used with my solar battery, and had my eye on this one for quite some time. I knew when I ordered it that it was not the end-all-to-end-all of toaster ovens, but it does do a surprisingly good job for its size. We have been using it every day since we received it and are very happy with it. My DH loves hot dogs and has been cooking them in this. The microwave causes the hotdogs to explode, but this little oven cooks them perfectly. Also, the night before I had cooked hamburger patties of which zi had two left over. I wrapped them in foil and put them in this cute oven, wound the timer to its full extent. The burgers came out steaming hot, and much better than nuking them in the microwave. Of course, it toasts bread beautifully -- even large slices of homemade bread, toaster pastries, anything that is fairly flat. This cute little guy gets up to 400 degrees, and only 400 degrees -- nothing more and nothing less. It is important to keep food at a distance from the upper burner to keep the food from burning. I have several Dash appliances and this little toaster oven is like them in that it cooks better with thawed food as opposed to frozen. There are all kinds of ideas on how to use (and not use) this very cute little oven. I can recommend Counter Cooking on YouTube. Who does "cute" appliances better than Dash? Also, not only are they cute, but they work! My next experiment for this toaster oven is thawed, flat chicken patties. One more recommendation would be to cover the enclosed baking pan with foil.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for short foods that need to be melty/crispy
reviews.reviewText: mine has a hotspot near the back corner that cooks just a little faster so i have to watch that and rotate food once if it needs more than a couple of minutes cooking time.great for flat foods that just need steady high heat.english muffin pizza, reheating cold pizza, toast, bagels, hash brown patties, heat and serve sausage patties, reheating mashed potatoes and you want a little crisping on top, melting cheese onto things: 10 out of 10.precooked frozen chicken tenders/nuggets: 8 out of 10, works but have to be turned a few times for even heating and to avoid sogginess on the bottom/char on the top.frozen biscuits, cookie dough: 0 out of 10, not worth the smoke alarm going off.i also figured out how to use foil and a small pan to make it a steamer for a red bean bun and that was delicious (and fun) but the bun is a little too tall and the first one burned.for best results, just use flat foods that don't sit too high in oven or they will char on top.a 4.25" square by 2" tall pan fits perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So darn cute!
reviews.reviewText: Yes, it is very small (one piece of bread for toast). It is so darn cute in my RV that I have to smile. I bought it for toast and warming up leftovers. The yellow color is rich. The oven is well made. I would buy it again (but, only for RV use).

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and looks good
reviews.reviewText: I love the size the way it works the ease of cleaning it. The color mint green. It's cute but big enough for 2 bisquits. Perfect dosent take much room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So cute a great compact appliance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DASH Mini Toaster Oven Cooker
reviews.reviewText: This is the most dreadful and dangerous product. I got it because it was small and cute and I needed a toaster and a toaster oven seemed like a bonus for open-face toasted cheese toast. Do NOT let children or even teens use this even with supervision. I am a 62 year old sensible woman and I burned myself twice with this. Once because I underestimated the thickness of the cloth needed to remove the tray after toasting, and then because I inadvertently brushed against the rack while it was still hot. This unit stays hot a long time. It smokes even when everything is clean so I have to use the stove ventilation hood every time and crack the kitchen window. The first time I used it (after following directions for prior to first use) I burnt the crap out of a piece of toast while it was on setting 3. I can only set it on setting 2 for toasting and even then I have to watch it. (Why does it have higher settings?) I don't even want to donate it to Salvation Army or Goodwill for fear someone will be burned in a similar way. This product should not be on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Loved this toaster… at first
reviews.reviewText: I’ve always wanted a toaster oven but I don’t have space for one. This one is tiny! It works great, it was inexpensive and it’s very cute.**Update**I’ve had this toaster a few months and I love hate it. It’s cute and it toasts but you can only do one piece of toast at a time so if you have someone over it’s takes forever just to make toast. Another issue is the whole toaster gets insanely hot, you need to supervise it while in use and unplug it when you are done. I don’t use it enough for it to drive me crazy but if you want to toast a lot and more than one piece get something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best little toaster you’ll ever want
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had many toasters over my lifetime all different types, but I must say this is my favorite is the cutest little toaster you ever wanna see but boy does it toast beautifullyIt fits an English muffin nicely half a bagel very nicely toast, white toast very nicely I can’t say anything else but how nice to have something that really works quickly and efficiently and and a good price especially now with time is being so ridiculous in high pricingThanks – DASH You make the best products without low loading peoples counters. Keep up the good work I always love seeing you things and buying new things.
Perfect size for individual use. I use this for my bagels. Toasts then perfectly. Small appliance so it doesn’t take up much room on the counter.
Está muy lindo y ocupa poco espacio para lugares pequeños cabe perfecto un sándwich

This is a neat mini toaster oven. I also use it to warm up pizza slices and it works very well. I would recommend this item. I have also made mini english muffin pizzas in it and they turned out awesome.

Yellow-I bought this to cook small frozen pizza on my counter top. But this oven is a way to small for that. Works good on toast but can only do one at a time. The sides gets very hot and no room to pull out rack to remove toast. I have a rack pull tool to do that as a pot holder is too big to use. I would rather have a pizza maker. And if I wanted toast I would of rather use a toaster.

Really handy appliance for small apartments as it barely takes up any countertop space. You will like this if you don't mind toasting one slice at a time. It toasts better than any of the brand name toasters and ovens that i used to own. You may not like that it cooks at only one temperature (400 degrees) but for me this was not a deal-breaker.
